title: 2D Low-Poly Fruits & Veggies - 60 Icon Set with Transparency
description: Enhance your game's visual appeal with our "2D Low-Poly Fruits & Veggies" asset pack!
longDescription:
Enhance your game's visual appeal with our "2D Low-Poly Fruits & Veggies" asset pack! This carefully crafted collection features 60 unique icons, each boasting a stylish low-poly design perfect for a variety of game genres. Whether you’re creating a cooking game, a farming simulator, or any project that could use a touch of nature, these vibrant and versatile icons are designed to add a fresh look to your interface.

Key Features:

  • A diverse selection of fruit and vegetable icons, from apples to zucchinis.
  • Crisp, clean low-poly art style that stands out in 2D environments.
  • Each icon is rendered at a resolution of 500x500 pixels, ensuring clarity and quality.
  • Transparent backgrounds for effortless integration into existing game designs.
  • PNG format for wide compatibility and easy use in most game development platforms.

Usability:

  • Drag and drop simplicity - designed for quick and easy implementation into your projects.
  • Perfect for inventory icons, menu elements, and interactive objects within games.
  • Suitable for educational apps to help children learn about healthy food choices.

Integration and Support:

  • First version release: fully tested and stable assets ready for production.
  • Seamlessly integrate with game engine
  • Ongoing support and updates based on user feedback and industry standards.

We encourage you to leave your review and rating to help us improve and provide you with the best possible assets for your development needs. Should you have any questions or need assistance, please contact us at puputi@abv.bg . Let's make your project come to life with our vibrant and wholesome fruit and veggie icons!
